articles.description: JB Hi Fi's sale is now underway, with offers of up to $1,007 off selected Samsung TVs and $1,000 off selected Samsung Galaxy phones.
articles.content: finder.com.au is one of Australia's leading comparison websites. We compare from a wide set of banks, insurers and product issuers. We value our editorial independence and follow editorial guidelines… [+3125 chars]
